divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from work at approximately 9:45 PM CST. I was passing by a Fazoli's restaurant on my right hand side. There is a patch of trees in the background of my photo. The blue and red object came up quickly out from behind the trees, hovered for about 5-10 seconds and then quickly left the area. I am not someone who has ever believed in U.F.O's, but from what I saw tonight could change my opinion on the subject. I rarely ever get the chills, but when I saw this object, the hair on my arm stood within a second. I hope no one thinks of me as crazy, but in my photo, you can see a small blue and red object in the dead center of the photo. It is EXTREMELY small, but I hope someone can help me out and tell me what it is.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in St Charles
There were no other sightings in St Charles on or around October 11th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: The object came up out of the trees, hovered and then flew away. I have a photo of the object.
